Class Request<T>

All Implemented Interfaces:
Later<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphRequestBase, QueryRequest
public class Request<T>
extends LaterWrapper<T,T>

Adds common characteristics for all types of batcher requests.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
A name that might be referenced later in other requests in the same batch.

setName

public void setName(java.lang.String value)
Set an explicit name that can be referenced later in other requests in the same batch. This works within multiquery and within graph calls, but you can't use names across the two types of batches.
